file_content.text: Always good to see you, Master Jedi.
At ease, soldier. You'll always be welcome here.
You've become quite the hero around here. Enjoy it.
Nice to see you haven't forgotten about us.
You saved House Organa's mission here. If I had a medal, I'd pin it right on you.
Your soldiers deserve a fighting chance.
Saving lives is my reward.
Now that you've given them that chance, I'll make sure they don't waste it.
It's enough to know I protected House Organa from harm.
Awards are unnecessary.
You honor us, Master Jedi--and we won't forget it.
Havoc Squad travels light, sir. Armor, weapons and ammo are all we need.
Medals only weigh me down.
You've shown my men what a real soldier looks like.
Tell you what. Give me some credits and I'll buy one for both of us.
Credits are better.
You're quite a mercenary--but I admire your results.
The mission was pretty easy.
You have a hero's modesty.
I have places to be.
Yes. I have business of my own.
One thing's certain... we can't afford another incident like this. It's time to implement new security protocols. If only Andra were here....
Thank you again for all you've done. Goodbye.
Hurry! Destroy the saboteurs before it's too late!
Listen carefully, an armored column is coming to reinforce our position.
King Ulgo has learned of our plans. He hired Rist saboteurs to destroy the armored column before it arrives.
Tell your armored column to turn back.
Warn your reinforcements.
I can't. They're moving through enemy territory on com-silence. By the time I can reach them, it will be too late.
That's all you had to say.
Why tell me?
Ulgo must have spies watching my men. You're the only one I trust to handle this.
The Rist saboteurs set up camp in some nearby caverns, next to a bridge.
They'll demolish the bridge as the armored column crosses it. We'll lose everything unless you destroy that saboteur camp immediately.
I like a straightforward goal--and this is as straightforward as they come.
Simple enough.
Not entirely. If the saboteurs can't reach the bridge, they won't hesitate to use their explosives on you. Be ready.
No problem.
The saboteurs will be well-armed and dug in. Be careful.
Those saboteurs are dead.
Kill them all, but do it fast.
Welcome back. You're like seeing the sun after a long time underground.
Andra contacted me from a medical convoy on its way to a safe zone.
You have my eternal gratitude. You not only saved my daughter's life, you've turned it around.
I made her listen to reason. The rest was easy.
It was my pleasure.
Now that she's safe, I can concentrate on Ulgo.
You promised a reward.
My only regret is that I can't pay you more.
I see you made it back.
Andra sent a disheartening communication. Some nonsense about spying on House Thul?
Stubborn girl escapes one disaster and rushes off to another.
Your daughter is brave and strong--give her some credit.
She's tougher than you think.
I don't want her brave and strong. I want her safe and secure.
Andra said this contains vital intelligence. You should have a look.
Look at this. [Give datapad]
She mentioned you were bringing a datapad. Let's see it....
You have to let her go.
Excuses don't interest me.
Andra mentioned she gave you a datapad. Said it was important. Let me have a look....
I recognize these coordinates... and that date. Blast Ulgo! How is he always a step ahead of us?
Why are you so worried?
Take a deep breath.
Don't leave me hanging!
I need you to save our mission here, my friend.
Unless you help me, House Organa's mission here is doomed.
You're my best hope of seeing Andra again. Save her from House Rist.
Ulgo's forces are advancing, Lieutenant. You will hold that outpost--no excuses! Cressen out.
Skies above--you bunch are a welcome sight.
A Jedi? Thank every star in the sky!
Havoc Squad, here? I can't believe my luck!
Mercenary or patriot? Doesn't matter--you're welcome here.
Stars alive! Where did you come from?
Major Cressen--First Organa Regiment. I'm in charge of holding this area against the usurper who calls himself King Ulgo.
I'll do whatever I can to aid House Organa's cause.
Consider me an ally.
Good. I'm in desperate need of your assistance.
This "usurper king" of yours--who is he?
Who is Ulgo?
The reason Alderaan's at war. Ulgo violated our rule of succession. Seized Alderaan's crown by force.
From what I've seen, your side is getting its rear flank handed to it.
You seem to be losing.
My men are holding their own, and I still have a few tricks more.
All my forces are committed to holding back Ulgo's army, but an important mission has just come up.
I need volunteers to invade an enemy stronghold and rescue one of my people.
I can't help unless you tell me everything, Major.
Give me more details.
It's my daughter, Andra. She's been captured.
That's my kind of fun.
Don't look at me.
This captive possesses vital intelligence about our enemy. We need her back.
If I had troops who could pull this off, I'd send them. You're my best hope.
You won me over, Major. Tell me about the mission.
Then I won't let you down.
Excellent. I need you to save my daughter Andra.
Maybe, maybe not.
If it matters, the person you'll be saving is my daughter Andra.
Against my express wishes, she infiltrated the Ulgos posing as a lowly servant girl.
She thinks she's some kind of hero, the reckless little fool!
Your daughter is a very brave young woman.
She is a hero.
Brave? It's lunacy. She has no training. That's why she got caught.
Your daughter is trying to help. What's wrong with that?
Why are you so upset?
She's not a spy. She's a girl with delusions of heroism.
Your daughter doesn't have much sense, does she?
Heroes just get killed.
You try to teach girls like her, but she's flung herself into the fire, the headstrong thing.
Two days ago, Andra transmitted an emergency alert. Ulgo jammed the frequency before she could reveal any information.
I feared the worst until my scouts picked up a distress call earlier today. It's a signal from Andra. She's alive.
I won't leave your daughter to die with the enemy.
I'll keep her that way.
I will be forever grateful to you, Master Jedi.
The Force is with her, and now so am I.
I'll keep her that way.
You don't know what that means to me, Master Jedi.
Havoc Squad will extract your daughter in one piece, Major.
I'll get her back safe.
I'll owe you a soldier's debt if you fulfill that promise.
Anybody who causes this much trouble deserves to be rescued.
And she'll stay that way.
Whatever you do, don't encourage her behavior.
Rescuing damsels in distress is my specialty. She is a damsel, right?
And she'll stay that way.
She's all I have left in this world.
Did she give any details in the distress call?
What else did she say?
It's not that kind of message--just a way to let me know she's still out there.
Not necessarily.
I taught Andra how to send a help signal when she was a child. She's the only one who would send it.
I've already lost Andra's mother and brothers to this war. If you save her, this recklessness must end.
She won't listen to me, but you might convince her to abandon her foolishness. I'd reward you for that favor.
One mission objective at a time, Major.
First things first.
Yes, of course.
I'll put some sense into her.
Thank you. I'll marry her into one of the lesser houses. She'll be safe.
Andra's signal came from the estate of House Rist, not far from here.
That filth Ulgo must have turned my daughter over to the Rist assassins for torture.
Are Rist and Ulgo allies?
What is Rist to Ulgo?
They support Ulgo's claim to the throne. In return, he pays them to do his dirty work--assassinations, torture, sabotage.
Better get moving, then.
If your daughter returns in less than pristine condition, don't blame me.
She may come back messy.
Seeing her alive will be comfort enough.
Please get Andra away from those filthy killers. Good luck.
I'm sorry, I can't bail out everyone.
I can't. [Refuse quest]
Think about it, won't you? She's in the clutches of the Rist. No one lasts long in there.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Then why are you people bothering me? Goodbye.
I understand, Master Jedi. Forgive me if I was presumptuous.
I see. Then you're dismissed, soldier.
It was foolish to think someone like you would accept such a dangerous mission.
Then please leave me. I have a battle regiment to oversee.
Good day.
I'm sorry, but I'm quite busy.
